import React, { useState } from 'react' import './ProjectsStyle.css' import brooke from '../img/brooke.gif' import Button from '../Button/Button' const Projects = () => { return (

Roller Diva

The task was to design a captivating portfolio for a professional roller skater. Key features requested were 80s themes, pastel colors, blog-style graphics, and an emphasis on video playback. Features implemented:

-Responsive design suitable for all devices.

-Play on hover feature implemented using Vimeo Player API.

-Utilized vibrant colors to match the skater's style and brand.

-Implemented a mix of Bootstrap and custom CSS styling to fix videos onto a carousel.

-Routed a custom contact page using PHP to send client inquiries.

Luna

The Travel Advisor app aims to provide users with the ability to locate trendy, good quality attractions in their area.

The user is able to use the search box to update the google maps API and display businesses in that specified area. A user can also filter out businesses by rating and type.

Additionally, I included a weather API to display weather conditions on the map. Tech used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, RapidAPI

Luna

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Illum, tenetur!

) } export default Projects
